thread.title: Diane O'Connor

author: Diane O'Connor
title: Diane O'Connor
text:
My older Pug was putting on weight despite my efforts to give her reduced calorie dog food. Then I came across Tails. At first their suggested measurements were a little too generous for her (she has bad back legs so can't walk too far) but I sought advice, cut it back a little and she is now the perfect weight and loves her new food.
It is so easy as it arrives the same time every month and costs nothing to ship. I have and will always have dogs in my life and Tails will be the way forward for all of them.
